title: Customer Success & Support Ops
desc: Onboarding, retention playbooks, CSAT improvement, proactive support, QA frameworks, and support team coaching across Zendesk, Gorgias, Intercom.

title: E-commerce Operations (Shopify/WooCommerce)
desc: Inventory, order fulfillment, supplier coordination, refund/returns policies, review management, and conversion-focused support processes.

title: Real Estate / Property Operations
desc: Maintenance coordination, tenant/vendor relations, SLA tracking, and SOPs in AppFolio/Buildium to improve response times and satisfaction.

title: Operations, SOPs & Automation
desc: Process design, documentation, Notion/Trello workflows, Google Workspace automations, and analytics to reduce resolution time and scale ops.
